attributes.action: Implement an Independent Inquiry into the execution of two dogs by Met Police
attributes.additional_details:
It is our firm belief that all animals, including dogs, deserve to be treated with compassion and respect. In this case, we believe that the officers involved failed to uphold this basic principle, and that their actions resulted in the unnecessary loss of life.

An independent inquiry should focus on determining whether the use of firearms was necessary and proportionate, and whether there were any alternatives that could have been pursued.

Viewer Caution:

https://youtu.be/yZAVsebV5Eg
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, are deeply concerned about the recent incident in which two dogs were fatally shot by police officers using firearms. We believe that this use of force was excessive and unjustified, and we call for an independent inquiry into the matter.
